alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai Southwest (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 3:36PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT KAUAI IN KAUAI COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM HST... At 334 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Na Pali State Park to 7 miles southwest of Barking Sands. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kapaa, Kekaha, Princeville, Kilauea, Alakai Swamp Trails, Hanalei, Na Pali State Park, Barking Sands, Wainiha, North Fork Wailua Trails, Waimea, Polihale, Kokee State Park, Haena, Waimea Canyon State Park, and Kalihiwai. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai Southwest
